description: This easy slow cooker pulled pork takes no effort and is worth waiting for.
name: Slow Cooker Pulled Pork Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Cook on low for 6-8 hours then remove the pork from the slow cooker and shred with 2 forks. Squish the garlic cloves out of their skin and place the pulled pork and garlic back in the sauce and serve.
